articles.title: Era ends, uncertainty looms as US forces pull out of main Afghanistan base - GMA News Online
articles.description: American troops pulled out of their main military base in Afghanistan on Friday, leaving behind a piece of the World Trade Center they buried 20 years ago in a country that could descend into civil war without them.

articles.author: Nicquel Terry Ellis, CNN
articles.title: Native Americans fear Supreme Court ruling on Arizona voting law will create barriers - CNN
articles.description: A Supreme Court ruling that upheld two provisions of Arizona voting law that restrict how ballots can be cast will make it more difficult for Native Americans in the state's tribal communities to vote, Navajo Nation activists say.
